title: Activision Blizzard 's net income/loss from 2005 to 2018
yAxis: Net income in million U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Net income in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Net income in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2005 to 2006, roughly decreasing from 2006 to 2007, roughly constant from 2007 to 2009, rapidly increasing from 2009 to 2011, and lastly roughly constant from 2011 to 2016.
The line rapidly increased by 208.89% from Year 2005 to 2006,increased by 269.91% from Year 2009 to 2010, and lastly, increased by 159.57% from Year 2010 to 2011.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Net income in million U.S. dollars, about 1149.0 was reported at Year 2012
Minimum Net income in million U.S. dollars about 45.0 was reached at Year 2005
